snippet: A fuel truck exploded after hitting part of a bridge on Thursday in the Saudi capital, Riyadh, engulfing buildings and cars in flames and killing at least 22 people and injuring more than 110.
lead_paragraph: A fuel truck exploded after hitting part of a bridge on Thursday in the Saudi capital, Riyadh, engulfing buildings and cars in flames and killing at least 22 people and injuring more than 110.

headline.seo: Saudi Arabia: Fuel Truck Explodes, Killing Many
headline.main: Saudi Arabia: Fuel Truck Explodes, Killing at Least 22 People
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: Fuel Truck Explodes, Killing at Least 22 People
